name: An SII file is a game data file used by SCS Software truck driving games and simulators, such as 18 Wheels of Steel: Haulin' and Euro Truck Simulator
summary: An SII file is a game data file used by SCS Software truck driving games and simulators, such as 18 Wheels of Steel: Haulin' and Euro Truck Simulator. SII files contain a variety of game data, such as truck properties, saved game data, player settings, and mod configurations. Some SII files contain data saved as plain text, while others contain binary data.
